title: NTPC to begin commercial operations of 2nd unit of North Karanpura power project
description: "Unit 2 (660 MW) of North Karanpura Super Thermal Power Project (3x660 MW) is declared on commercial operation with effect from 00:00 hours of 20.03.2024," NTPC said in an exchange filing.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
